overview: Early classics from director Matt Sterling. Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios and Dimension Films. "Winter's Come" (a.k.a. "Teenage Sex Party") — Rick, Steve, and Don are three beautiful young boys together on a short winter vacation. "Out Of Control" — Davy and Bert had never met before but were aware of one another's reputation of being completely uninhibited. Both were surprised by their great attraction for each other when they met. "On Leave" — Bob was on leave from the service when he met Chris, who was quick to show Bob everything he'd learned. "A Winter Place" — Keith, Dean and Skip enjoy the open conversation near the warm fire. But the conversation soon becomes sexual and the three found themselves turning each other on with stories of their past conquests.
title: Out Of Control
